      • getPrivateKeyAndCertChain

        public PrivateKeyAndCertChain getPrivateKeyAndCertChain(java.security.KeyStore aKeyStore,
                                               java.lang.String aKeyPassword)
                                                 throws TopLevelException
        Specified by:
        getPrivateKeyAndCertChain in interface PkiGeneric
        Returns:
        private key and certification chain corresponding to it, extracted from given keystore using given password to access the keystore and the same password to access the private key in it. The keystore is considered to have only one entry that contains both certification chain and the corresponding private key. If the certificate has no entries, an exception is trown. It the keystore has several entries, the first is used.
        Throws:
        TopLevelException

      • encodeX509CertChainToBase64

        public java.lang.String encodeX509CertChainToBase64(java.security.cert.Certificate[] aCertificationChain)
                                             throws TopLevelException
        Specified by:
        encodeX509CertChainToBase64 in interface PkiGeneric
        Returns:
        Base64-encoded ASN.1 DER representation of given X.509 certification chain.
        Throws:
        TopLevelException
